column2: top 10 meal I've had in my life.  The lyonnaise salad has a great
column3: almost smokey dressing.  Filet was super tender and meltly in your mouthy
column4: served with a decadent bernaise sauce.  I tried four sides - Mac
column6: mushrooms and creamed spinach - all amazing
column8: each bite so flavorful.  Really loved everything about it
